RumorFact.Text: Solanum is the last Nomai alive. What if I'll show her what I know with vision torch from <color=green>Stranger</color>?

After the vision something strange happened. Clouds just disappeared, I can hear now kind of <color=green>frequencies</color> coming from Solanum, also that sparks on her mask - that looks bizarre. Was it good idea tho?
She was here and saw what I saw. She took her recorder from the shuttle and asking me to find her ...outside the Quantum Moon?
